mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysProcdrExecutHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PROCDR_EXECUT_SN , PROCDR_NM , BEG_DT , END_DT , ELAPSE_TIME , PROCDR_EXECUT_STAT_CD , MSG_CONT , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_PROCDR_EXECUT_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROCDR_EXECUT_SN = #{procdrExecutSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteSysProcdrExecutHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM SYS_PROCDR_EXECUT_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND PROCDR_EXECUT_SN = #{procdrExecutSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
